kpi.name: M1022C71

kpi_info.title: FRAME LOSS INDICATIONS SENT DUE TO TRAFFIC LOSS
kpi_info.use: The number of "Congestion indication control frame - frame loss" sent to BTS due to Iub traffic loss detected by Frame protocol. When the RNC Frame Protocol entity sends "Congestion Indication control frame - frame loss" indication to the base station due to Iub traffic loss detected by Frame protocol.This counter is updated for all cells in the UEs E-DCH active set controlled by the base station for which the Congestion Indication was sent. The counter is not updated for E-DCH soft handover branches controlled by base stations whose Iub interface is not congested, because Congestion Indication is not sent to them.

kpi.kpi_alias: FRAME LOSS INDICATIONS SENT DUE TO TRAFFIC LOSS
